unnormalised: Arre yaar, the govt. really needs to do more about dengue in Delhi! Every year, same story, right? Saw on the news they're reporting like 500+ new cases this week alone. My neighbour, Mrs. Sharma, got it last month and was hospitalised for 5 days. They should be fogging regularly, not just when the numbers spike. Maybe fine people who let water accumulate in their coolers or tyres. This is getting serious, man! #DelhiHealth #DengueAlert
normalised: Arey yaar, the government really needs to do more about dengue in Delhi! Every year, same story, right? Saw on the news they are reporting like five hundred plus new cases this week alone. My neighbor, Missus Sharma, got it last month and was hospitalized for five days. They should be fogging regularly, not just when the numbers spike. Maybe fine people who let water accumulate in their coolers or tires. This is getting serious, man! hash Delhi Health hash Dengue Alert
